main.description: I'm a Software Engineer with more than 9 years of professional experience in various business fields, ranging from ERPsystem, Banking System, Exchanger Crypto and Online Travel Agent
main.bio: Hello! I'm Ahmad Gilang Zain Wahabi Software Engineer specializing in Java. Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects or Backend with Microservices architecture using SQL or No SQL database. also i develop NFT project

resume.skillmessage: This is all my skill based on my experience

work.title: Software Engineer II
work.description: As a backend engineer in here I do analysis from the story, develop features base on task and story, create unit test, code review, fix sonar, create integration test, deploy to testing environment, support QA testing and deploy to production, handle bugs from testing environment, handle bugs from production and also sometimes help team perftest to test about performance. in here i'm handle all service Flight Discovery Team.

work.title: Senior Fullstack Java Developer
work.description: As a full stack java developer in here I do interview with client to have what client need, analysis document from client, create feature base on analysis result, doing self test, deploy to server testing, deploy to production, handle bugs from testing, handle bugs from production. Also I do performance test and security test with PCIDSS Team. and I'm handle multiple project at the same time in here.

work.title: Full Stack Java Developer
work.description: As a full stack java developer in here I do analysis from FSD document, and create feature base on FSD. Deploy to server testing, deploy to production and also handle if any bugs in testing or production.
